*[[Romantic love]] – affection characterized by a mix of emotional and sexual desire.

*[[Romantic love]] – affection characterized by a mix of emotional and sexual desire. Traditionally portrayed in the West as tragicomic, sad, joyful, and complex.
 
*[[Unrequited love]] – affection and desire not reciprocated or returned.

*[[Covenant love]] - an unconditional decision of the will to place the needs and benefits of another person before oneself.

*Active Love - A voluntary practice of "knowing what someone truly is and caring for that to the exclusion of all else". Linked in some respects to philosophy of [[Non-Duality]] and certain types of [[magic]].
+
*Active Love - A voluntary practice of "knowing what someone truly is and caring for that to the exclusion of all else". Linked in some respects to philosophy of [[Non-duality]] and certain types of [[magic]]. Cited by Deepak Chopra and Marelin Thornton as a more "[[Wizard]]ly" love, as compared to all other types.
